column13: AKA NRAMP. Promoter region microsatellite has 4 alleles observed: (1) t(gt)5ac(gt)5ac(gt)11g; (2) t(gt)5ac(gt)5ac(gt)10g; (3) t(gt)5ac(gt)5ac(gt)9g; (4) t(gt)5ac(gt)9g. Allele 3 drives high expression. READ PAPER for more info
